title: Once on a Time
description: The princess knew that someday her prince would come. But she had no idea he'd come as a big shock.It was bad enough he arrived in the form of a -- (it's a little too nasty to put on the cover where little children might read it).But it was even worse when after a great deal of trouble he was turned back into himself.And turned out to be a beast of another and even more confounding kind.In short, a man.
author: A.A. Milne
